message: Let's start with a fair deal.  I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  Hopefully, we can both walk away happy.
I'll give you a slightly better offer. You can have 40% and I'll take 60%.
I'm willing to compromise, but 40% isn't enough. Let's split it 60/40, with me taking the larger share.
I'll try to find a middle ground. You can have 45% and I'll take 55%.
